mapper.insert: INSERT INTO port( port_num, user_id, b_category_num, s_category_num, port_title, port_detail_content, port_price, port_Img, port_file, port_period ) VALUES( #{port_num}, #{user_id}, #{b_category_num}, #{s_category_num}, #{port_title}, #{port_detail_content}, #{port_price}, #{port_Img}, #{port_file}, #{port_period} );
